channel.title: Winzy!
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://www.winzy.com/f/anow2][IMG]http://i.winzy.com/b/ak.gif[/img][/URL][/center] Really cool site, All you have to do is search 50 Times a day, and you get 100 points, which enters you into a drawing for 500$, or whatever the month's prize is, Everyone that was referred by you or is referred by your referrer share the same prize. SOOO... If we get everyone on Impsoft (1028) to sign-up, and everyone searches 100 times a day (5-10 minutes) we will have an 102,800 Points, THEN, you have to take into consideration the bonus (I just got 500 points, my first round) say every 4th person gets that bonus and no one else gets a bonus, We will ALL have won 128,500 points, so us as a whole will have 132,200,800 points. The chances are that we will win, the current month's Grand Prize is $500. If any one of us win EVERYONE at impsoft will get the $500. [hr] [u]How to Join[/u] 1. Signup using this referral URL -- [url=http://www.winzy.com/anow2]http://www.winzy.com/anow2[/url] 2. Go to [url=http://toolbar.winzy.com]http://toolbar.winzy.com[/url] and download the appropriate ToolBar, or Search Engine-Plugin. 3. Search any random thing 3 times, then pick a new random thing, search that 3 times, etc. 4. When you reach 100 points a "Mini-Game" will pop up. 5. Finish it, and report what you have contributed here! [hr] I will post this exact post in RS-R to even further develop the group. Sepranem is going to create a "WebAuto" component to iBot, then create a script for this site (To speed up the process by a few seconds, for the lazy ones) To Everyone, Good Luck!
From Impsoft, hope everyone joins :)

item.title: Winzy!
item.dc:creator: @anow2 anow2
item.description:
@anow2 wrote:

[center][URL=http://www.winzy.com/f/anow2][IMG]http://i.winzy.com/b/ak.gif[/img][/URL][/center]

Really cool site, All you have to do is search 50 Times a day, and you get 100 points, which enters you into a drawing for 500$, or whatever the month’s prize is, Everyone that was referred by you or is referred by your referrer share the same prize.

SOOO…
If we get everyone on Impsoft (1028) to sign-up, and everyone searches 100 times a day (5-10 minutes) we will have an 102,800 Points, THEN, you have to take into consideration the bonus (I just got 500 points, my first round) say every 4th person gets that bonus and no one else gets a bonus, We will ALL have won 128,500 points, so us as a whole will have 132,200,800 points. The chances are that we will win, the current month’s Grand Prize is $500. If any one of us win EVERYONE at impsoft will get the $500.
[hr]
How to Join

  1. Signup using this referral URL – http://www.winzy.com/anow2
  2. Go to http://toolbar.winzy.com and download the appropriate ToolBar, or Search Engine-Plugin.
  3. Search any random thing 3 times, then pick a new random thing, search that 3 times, etc.
  4. When you reach 100 points a “Mini-Game” will pop up.
  5. Finish it, and report what you have contributed here!
    [hr]
    I will post this exact post in RS-R to even further develop the group.
    Sepranem is going to create a “WebAuto” component to iBot, then create a script for this site (To speed up the process by a few seconds, for the lazy ones)

To Everyone, Good Luck!


From Impsoft, hope everyone joins

Read full topic
